System Requirements:
Processor: 1.2GHz or higher

Video card RAM: 128MB
DirectX Version: 8.0 or above

#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Hidden Identity - Chicago Blackout_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

You awake with amnesia in a Chicago hotel room and can't remember your own name. Who are you? And how did you get here? In Hidden IdentityT - Chicago Blackout, only you can explore scenes from your past and find clues to your lost identity. Uncover all the secret notes that you left behind and solve unique mini-games to jog your memory. Will you unravel the mystery and discover your true identity? Keep your wits about you and solve a very personal mystery in Hidden IdentityT - Chicago Blackout!
